Title: Provides for coverage for prescription drugs under Medicaid; repealer
Summary: Provides that prescription drugs eligible for reimbursement shall be provided and paid for under the preferred drug program and the clinical drug review program; restores pharmacy benefits under Medicaid managed care.
LawCode: Rpld Part FFF §§1 & 1-a, Chap 56 of 2020; add §365-i, rpld §364-j sub 4 ¶(u), subs 25 - 26-b, Soc Serv L; amd §273, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to prescription drugs eligible for Medicaid coverage; to amend the public health law, in relation to prior authorization under the preferred drug program; to repeal certain provisions of part FFF of chapter 56 of the laws of 2020 directing the department of health to remove the pharmacy benefit from the managed care benefit package, relating to restoring such benefits; and to repeal certain provisions of the social services law, relating to coverage for certain prescription drugs under Medicaid managed care programs
